title: Accardo
author: Accardo
content: After the initiation of Faucet where traders were gifted 5 btc each, the integration of bitcoin exchange began with bitcoin market as the first exchange in the cryptocurrency market launched 2010. Buyers sent Paypal to the bitcoin seller then the exchange holds the funds until the sellers gets the funds. So they served as Escrow during the period. And it was the only exchange that is similar to the exchange of today. https://www.gemini.com/cryptopedia/crypto-exchanges-early-mt-gox-hack

Any information on that?
